website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight and affordable bar table that's great for traveling bartenders.
pros: Great size but still light enough for hassle-free transport
An attachable skirt  hides materials underneath table
cons: Not ideal for constant heavy workloads

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when I first opened this product. It’s seem to be light but sturdy and i was able to put it together pretty quickly. On further inspection it looks like the top of the bar is used or recycled. It looks like there was writing on it and marks that were attempted to be covered up with black marker. Disappointed because I would’ve given it five stars if not for this.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for wine and beer demos!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item in 2014 and still working AMAZING for me!!! I use this every weekend to do my wine and beer demos in grocery stores. I always get compliments on the height and the extra shelf on the table!! Also this table can fit anywhere!! So happy to have this item for so long!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: ... in liquor promotions on occasion and this table is PERFECT for sampling’s
customer_reviews.text: I work in liquor promotions on occasion and this table is PERFECT for sampling’s. The shelf comes in handy to hide your personal belongings and extra ice bucket. Would recommend for those working in promo!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my liquor demos and it does a great job. Received many compliments! Its not sturdy like a solid piece of furniture but that would make the table heavier to haul around. Lots of room and the shelf is very handy. Great investment as long as it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: J_J713

customer_reviews.title: I love the concept
customer_reviews.text: This table was a required purchase by a tasting company that I work for. I love the concept, I love the skirt that velcros around the table and hides all of my supplies, I love the shelf where I can put my purse and supplies, I love the height..........I HATE the instability. It scares me every time I load this table with bottles and an ice bucket, even more when I am working with an electric pan full of greasy sausage. I would actually pay a bit more, and compromise on the light weight feature for this same concept in a more stable design. The little aluminum legs and supports are just not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: Yes! If you need a demo table, get this one!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I got this table! I went back and forth between which table to get and this was the best deal. I have used the hek out of the table for events and demos. Never any problems. It’s light weight material but it holds up (easy to carry) I take good care of it just as a precautionary. My team likes that it’s professional in appearance: some demo tables are short and small. This resembles a small bar. So glad I went for this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this portable bar
customer_reviews.text: Love this portable bar. Very easy to put together. I used it for a party. The bartender I hired said it was a perfect size. I has a shelf you can not see in the picture. Great for mixing drinks and I can use it on my deck as well.
customer_reviews.author: LaTonya Butler

customer_reviews.title: Yesssss sir!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for what I needed. Some reviews say the shelf is very flimsy amd although it is made out of what appears to be particle board it still holds plenty of weight. I love that it is portable so I'll be able to move the bar outside during summer BBQs. If you really are worried about the shelf, go to the hardware store and have them cut a solid wood piece of the same dimension. It will still be worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: WhitsTheShit

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive convenient portable bar!
customer_reviews.text: Took to help set up a hospitality suite for a family wedding. I was concerned it was a little flimsy but we used it for hours daily over a long weekend. I braced one end against a wall and had no trouble. Easy to clean, the perfect height and very portable. Light and easy to put together in seconds. Folds flat and easy carrying case. This is a great deal. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mark One

customer_reviews.title: Nice little table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table to use as a check stand at craft shows. I love that it also has the shelf that I can use for my cash box, bags, etc. I do wish the shelf was stronger, it’s very thin and won’t hold very much weight. I love the carrying bag it comes with. Very easy to set up and put away. I like it a lot; just wish that for the price, it were a little more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Miers

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, poor product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it hoping to have a bar height table for a bartender at parties. It is too small & too flimsy. I would not trust bottles or wine glasses on this. They should make a bigger & better one & sell it at a profit. Being able to fold it and put it away between uses would be great.
customer_reviews.author: F. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Expected better construction/quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The table is convenient and super easy to set up! I am disappointed with the quality of it, it seems a bit flimsy and would definitely fall over if it was bumped. For the price I paid, over $60, I expected more. I will keep however, because of the convenience but I would definitely set it up against a wall for added sturdiness. I think more appropriate pricing would be $35-40.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok for what it's intention is for but if you want something sturdier you definitely have to be willing to pay more.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great as a cashier’s stand!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a cashiers table to use with my booths. It worked great. I hid my cash box underneath and all my other items. I did not have anything heavy on it. It was a little shaky. I am not sure it would hold anything to heavy and feel it would be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and rickety
customer_reviews.text: The table is light and for someone like me with chronic back pain, it's easy to move. I use it for drink demos at various stores and the set-up/take down is easy. It's not the sturdiest table but as long as you don't weigh it down, there's no issue. I really like the middle shelf (removable) as it can hold my purse or whatever while I'm working and is hidden from public view.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Portable bar for gigs, service.
customer_reviews.text: A bit unstable empty but with stuff on it, it settles down. Easy to set up and take down. Love the cloth wrap. Looks professional. I am a Renta-bar and bud tender. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: not very sturdy. and not worth the 60$ I payed for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table because I needed on for my job. this product is flimsy, cheaply made, not very sturdy. and not worth the 60$ I payed for. its worth more like 25$
customer_reviews.author: lisa winslow

customer_reviews.title: Love it but need some upgrades
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and inexpensive product. Portable, light, easy to assemble, and don't take up much space. However, it can be easily knocked over, or damaged during storage or transport if not taken care of properly.
customer_reviews.author: Don Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great for a recent hotel stay!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to set up in our hotel room to surprise my wife during a recent hotel stay! She was very impressed! Gave the room a cool ambiance and we always had drinks at the ready! Set it up in minutes and every time the hotel staff saw it, they gave us big props! We'll be using this on other trips and in our house during parties. Got a great warehouse/open box deal, too!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: great tables for trade shows
customer_reviews.text: These tables are great. very portable. I use them for art festivals to display my jewelry. They are the right height for displaying jewelry so that people do not have to bend over to see them. they look very professional.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Stribling

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, not heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, a little more flimsy than I had hoped. I use it at vendor shows and it looks good so the durability isn’t most important to me. It is very light weight which makes it easy to handle and set up by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Just fold when done and put in bag.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice portable bar. It easy to move around just fold it and put in the bag it came with. So it doesn't take up any room. Good bar when you're bartending at different places.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only this is, I recommend getting plexiglass to cover the top so it won’t warp if it gets wet.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great look!
customer_reviews.text: The item offered a great look for outdoor entertainment. I wished it were about 6 inches wider and the skirt above an inch wider for a better look. I didn't like the gap presented between the top and the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Godhasme

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Affordable! Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing! I had to bartend for an event and it was the perfect addition to my mobile bartending business! Easy to take down and put up, very easy to clean and it’s just a great item to buy! All smile and all stars!
customer_reviews.author: C. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: a table with great potential
customer_reviews.text: The table is designed well. Easy to transport. Quick to setup. The only problem I have experienced is its stability. It is light and a little bit wobbly. I wish it would be heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Fynnol Gray

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, good size and height
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful. I use this for demo stations, and it's just the right height and size. I like that you have the black wrap all the way around. It also comes with a shelf in the back half way that's hidden, but VERY helpful. The table folds easily and the carrying case is very helpful. Just wish the carrying case had a zipper or some closing mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: nice portable bar
customer_reviews.text: i like that the shelf is optional and can be placed easily, i also like how overall simple the design is. i do believe it should be slightly wider but it works. the additional cover is okay but not necessary especially since it's randomly green. maybe that is a popular and desired color but i would prefer to have had two black.
customer_reviews.author: Jaye

customer_reviews.title: We had are business logo put on the wrap- looks awesome. The only thing we had to do was ...
customer_reviews.text: We have several of these tables use them as a sample table at farmers markets and in store promotions. We had are business logo put on the wrap- looks awesome. The only thing we had to do was put on extra velcro to keep the wrap tight around the table (but that was probably due to use)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beginners portable bar
customer_reviews.text: This is a great choice for a starter portable bar because of it’s easy assembly and ability to hold about 60 lbs but the closing/opening mechanics are defective....this bar can easily be worn out within the first use because it is hard to close. I recently purchased another and had the same issue but the price is inexpensive and it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki R

customer_reviews.title: Good quality! Worthwhile purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect! I used it to place baked goods and drink dispensers on at an open house for a house I was selling. I am the seller, not a realtor, and wanted to make the open house nice.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Leach

customer_reviews.title: This bar is a hit!!
customer_reviews.text: The set-up is super easy, the table bar is quite steady/sturdy for the price and the bag makes it easy for carry.
customer_reviews.author: Ambiance2000

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need.
customer_reviews.text: It is a cheap portable show table. Its great for the price. It's stable enough to write on and doesn't take up much room.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! LOVE! LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! LOVE! LOVE! Y'all, it took me longer to get scissors and open the box than it did to set this little bar/table up! It's fully assembled right out of the box. Slide it from the carrying case, fold both legs out, insert the shelf, Velcro the skirt on and that's it! I plan to use this as a vendor booth checkout station. It is super lightweight but will be perfect for checking out customers.
customer_reviews.author: Mama K

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! I use it at events as my "check-out" table and it works great! So glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly! Could be more sturdy and durable for the price. Same day shipping was on point!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Lingerfelt

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever bought for my job.
customer_reviews.text: This table was the best thing I’ve ever bought for my job when I was a liquor promo girl. Super light easy to set up best investment you’ll ever make.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Rae’

customer_reviews.title: Quality. Easy to use. Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tables. I ordered two to use in booth shows and other events. Having them counter high works so much easier. I like that they come with carry cases too. Everyone asked where I got them as they liked not having to bend over so far to complete paperwork or look at items. Great!
customer_reviews.author: TlSwanny

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great to use if you want to set up a bar anywhere. Nice height and size.
customer_reviews.author: Jasma Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to assemble but it’s a bit unstable. When you are cutting fruits on this table, it wobbles...
customer_reviews.author: Marie Y.

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I will be getting another one. Nice size and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Burt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold and to carry
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a demonstration. It has a bag, and easy to carry and put together.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Bueno

customer_reviews.title: Compact, simple, wobbly
customer_reviews.text: It worked very well for the compact bar I set up for a party. It's not large or very tall. It's a bit wobbly, and the shelf felt a bit dubious to me as it bowed when we put bottles of liquor on it. I ended up putting a crate underneath to prop up the shelf just so I didn't have to worry about overloading it. It's easy to set up and put away.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing important stuff
customer_reviews.text: Missing the carrying case, the mean reason for buying this item, this sucks. Size is very awkward and trying to find a replacement carrying case for this portable bar👎🏾!
customer_reviews.author: Catina

customer_reviews.title: It is as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for my needs and I can use it for many different things. It was delivered quickly, in great condition. I am very satisfied. I almost did not get based on some reviews am glad I decided to go forward with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jessica farrish

customer_reviews.title: Bar height table, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. It’s flimsy and the top is slick, it did the job for my space at the farmers market but I would not trust it to hold liquor bottles. You get what you pay for. It is a bar height table NOT A BAR. Do not trust it to hold alcohol bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah AM

customer_reviews.title: ... this table to do product demos and it works great! It is light and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: I am using this table to do product demos and it works great! It is light and easy to carry, and I really like the shelf underneath, it helps me keep everything organized. The legs are a little stiff on one side so I have to mess with it a little to get it to lock, and then to fold back up, but other than that I am very happy
customer_reviews.author: Rae Hartsock

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Love this portable bar. Easy to put together and take down!
customer_reviews.author: Tina love

customer_reviews.title: Best investment
customer_reviews.text: Great for cocktail parties comes with 2 covers and a bag to carry it in. easy set up and it has a shelf I didn't expect! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: party to go
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I can use this anywhere. its lite weight, it comes with its own carrying bag and it is easy to set up and break down.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret R. Caballero

customer_reviews.title: Very Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for a pop-up party anywhere! Or an event venue that doesn't provide a bar. We branded them by applying Big, Thick, Paper Photo Frames (Black Borders and Black Electrical Tape blend right into black fabric, and are easily removed) and printing out large logos to place inside. Might be a good idea for trade shows/sample sales too.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Looked very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I reinforced the cover with a black table cloth and fairy lights. Looked very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: It looks pretty professional, too
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it's worth the price, but it gets the job done! It looks pretty professional, too!
customer_reviews.author: Sif

customer_reviews.title: So flimsy...It wouldn't survive a night
customer_reviews.text: The concept is fantastic, but upon receipt of the product, we opened it up and set it up. It was so incredibly flimsy that we packed it right back up. There is no way this would survive one night.
customer_reviews.author: ajotter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table
customer_reviews.text: Loveeeeeeee this table. I use it for my face painting business and it's perfect. Great carry case and I love the shelf and cover it brings.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Aguilar Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome it was the perfect size my bartender had enough space
customer_reviews.author: V.N.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier than than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our intimate wedding. Just enough space for the tip jar, bar accessories, & specialty drinks. It was a big hit! An unexpected surprise for the guest!
customer_reviews.author: sirena sharpe-colley

customer_reviews.title: Great for cocktail parties.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for a small party of around 35. Our bartender used it with no trouble - incredibly easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: K B

customer_reviews.title: Great portable table.
customer_reviews.text: Item was perfect size for what we needed it. Portable with case and skirt. Ordered 2, returned 1.(no need for 2nd one) Very easy return.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great Product and easy to carry very convenient and easy setup
customer_reviews.author: Nydia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money! Not hoot table it’s cheesy. Not Sturdy, and was delivered with a giant whole in middle of table top. Save your money and find a nicer and cheaper bar somewhere else
customer_reviews.author: Stacy L

customer_reviews.title: Easily To Assemble
customer_reviews.text: This products was easy to assemble. It is sturdy enough to hold drinks a little bit over 100 lbs. The shelf is not as sturdy, it can bend it if there is too many items on it.
customer_reviews.author: Aniyah

customer_reviews.title: Skirt is Too small
customer_reviews.text: This includes a black skirt that is made 2 inches Too Small to attach to the velcro strips! Making this thing worthless. Hopefully the seller will replace it. Too Bad they didn't leave a link to contact the seller directly like most places we order from...
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: super light and compact
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. It is so light and compact. I am 5'1" petite female. It is perfect for me to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: portable bar
customer_reviews.text: pathetic = flimsy and will not stand up to even the slightest wind or movement
customer_reviews.author: Renee jones

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: It was dented when Inreceived. I should have purchased the used model. I kept it because I had an event so didn’t have time to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: traveling bar
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. It is extremely easily to assemble and take down. The carrying case is an added bonus. All bartenders should invest in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Deecue

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay..
customer_reviews.text: It’s an okay table.. came as described. It is pretty flimsy though and the top is very thin.. probably shouldn’t put anything heavy on here
customer_reviews.author: Desmond Deverux

customer_reviews.title: The product I'd good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It was just the right size for the space I needed it for. I used it for my husband's 50th birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bar area
customer_reviews.text: Cute addition to event bar! Its makes the bar area looks elegant! It will be wonderful its has wheels.
customer_reviews.author: mame

customer_reviews.title: It did its job but you will need to purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: It did its job but you will need to purchase rubber mats so it does not destroy the top or bottom self.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our outdoor entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: Good for our outdoor entertaining. Has a shelf on the inside to store back-up supplies/drinks. Very easy to put up and take down. It's lightweight so be careful if it's windy. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Menews

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh, works for me
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my gigging table to set up my Cd's and tip jar on. It looks okay. It's cheaply made but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Kino

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: The item was a resale item no damage but missing the bag to storage. Disappointed because I would have paid full price to have complete package.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Buy this Portable bar / demo table!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast ship! Bought this for a friend who does Wine and Spirits Demo’s . Well made , light weight, sturdy. Clean and professional look! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: I like the bar because it very light weight and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👎🏽
customer_reviews.text: The item was true to size . It seem as if it was already used when I received it . If I had to order it again , I would not !!
customer_reviews.author: Vera Howard

customer_reviews.title: As described- light weight
customer_reviews.text: Great table, as described. Light weight and folds easy for transport. Carring bag works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Table is fine but shelf is chipping already. Carrying case ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Alfa

customer_reviews.title: Tipsy
customer_reviews.text: It is not sturdy for putty any weight upon it.
customer_reviews.author: car

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected! I'm going to add more velcro so I can position the cover the way I want it! It was in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: Lynnie

customer_reviews.title: Dented Leg
customer_reviews.text: Great product, except it arrived with a large dent on one of the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Portable Bar
customer_reviews.text: I had a get together. The Bar looked so nice. It was easy to put together. Money well spent
customer_reviews.author: dorethea johnsnon

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price, looks great
customer_reviews.text: I liked the light weight and the look of it but i wish it was more stable
customer_reviews.author: Jese

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great...
customer_reviews.text: Table is a good height, lightweight, easy to carry and easy to fold and unfold. Middle shelf was a bit worn around the edges, indicating to me that I can't use it very much. That's a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: humphreezy

customer_reviews.title: I love my bar it held up great for my outside ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my bar it held up great for my outside party . The reason I didn't give five stars cause the lest bit of water will leave spots on it other than that it worked great. I love the shirts to that I can change out.Very easy put together I done it by my self !
customer_reviews.author: Wham

customer_reviews.title: Easy put up and take down nice look!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! Perfect for gatherings indoor or out. Great for catering small events too!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Utterly Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrive broken. I could not even use it - just chucked in the bin. Waste of my time and money to return. A total wast of my money
customer_reviews.author: Spa Cafe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I use it for events!! And it is just perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: tina coler

customer_reviews.title: Table is very unstable.
customer_reviews.text: I liked absolutely nothing about it! I returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: High price for nothing special
customer_reviews.text: A little dissapointed. Its nice, sturdy, but but overpriced for sure-Nothing special about it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S

customer_reviews.title: great lightweight table and good construction
customer_reviews.text: great lightweight table and good construction. Took off one star since I believe curtain could be better quality and could attach more securely to the table.
customer_reviews.author: CharlieCat

customer_reviews.title: At first I was disappointed because it wasn't what I expected
customer_reviews.text: At first I was disappointed because it wasn't what I expected. Decided to go ahead and use it; glad I did/. It was an easy setup and looked professional.
customer_reviews.author: Peekitty

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a pop up bar at a party
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i love this
customer_reviews.text: This was to cute and I wish it was a little bigger but its a good value
customer_reviews.author: sokia towner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transport and set up
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, light weight and portable, I use it for product demos in stores! I have already recommended it to two other demo gals this week, they were very impressed with the dimensions and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it may wear out. I’m crossing my fingers it doesn’t.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Works great for my demonstration job. Wish the legs and additional shelf had a lock.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: thank you for making my work easier! table is light and simple to assemble and carry around! it is perfect for parties!
customer_reviews.author: Lidelalive

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient.
customer_reviews.text: As a freelance bartender this is a must have. I’m consider purchasing a second to have as a back bar to store more drink related items.
customer_reviews.author: Matthias Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Comes handy for parties
customer_reviews.text: Works really good just wish it was a bit bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Trademark Innovations Portable Bar Table - Carrying Case Included -
product_meta.description: This portable bar table is easy to set up for any party. Also a great space saver if you have a small apartment, & can also be used for trade shows. The portable bar comes with a black skirt & has a convenient storage bag. Be the hit of your next party & bring along the portable bar. 40 inch Tall , Surface 16 x 40 inches. The table will support up to 65lbs. Bar accessories not included. By Trademark Innovations
feature_bullets: Collapsible for easy transport and set up
40 inch Tall and Surface 16 x 40 inches. Supports 65lbs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars430 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
